name: Flashback 2150
description:
Flashback 2150 is a spiritual successor to Flashback (1992). It takes players through the short adventure of Arnold A. Goss, a janitor who wakes up in his own workplace with a gun and no recollection of how he got there. In addition Flashback 2150 is a side scrolling shooter with puzzles and various platforms to play around with

Explore the environment, solve puzzles and discover just what is going on in Flashback 2150!
